:: Dracon ::

Dracon, finding nothing better to do while they wait to arriv=
e at their planned destination, slouches in the corner.
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: Jeff 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, J=
une 17, 2003 7:29 PM
  Subject: StarDrill Inc.


  --Rukus--

  "We can eng=
age space warp drive systems when we reach 20 thousand 
  metras from the s=
tation, we're five thousand and increasing. 
  Estimated time is 700 micros=
. 698... 697..." Rukus presses a few 
  buttons on his console and his scre=
en displays the space cruiser and 
  the station in a relative plane.


  -=
-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
  > Krhinos=
: Then we're off. Make them roar, Dracon! (He opens a 
  channel
  > with t=
he DockMaster) Station Arx Metallicus ready for departure. 
  Open
  > the =
doors, would you?
  > 
  > Dockmaster: Self-centered youngsters... Never ha=
ppy are ya? I'll 
  open
  > the slaggin' doors, but ya better scram or I m=
ight close them on 
  ya...
  > 
  > Krhinos said nothing back. He simply p=
ressed an ignition key that 
  made
  > the whole station shudder with a lo=
w rumble. The doors slowly 
  opened
  > and the base started flying outwar=
d. Soon, it was passed the huge
  > gates and off into space.
  > 
  > Krhi=
nos: Rukus, give me an estimateof the time we'll be travelling
  > before w=
e're ok to warp.
  > 
  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "LurkerAbyss" <164=
1coburn@r...> 
  wrote:
  > > Dracon acknowledges Krhinos' word.
  > > 
  >=
 > "I'm on it Captain," he says as he makes his way to the engine 
  and
  =
> control area.
  > > 
  > > After flicking around and double-checking the =
systems to  make 
  sure
  > everything is in order, he smiles.
  > > 
  > =
> "We're good to go," he reports.

  >=
 >   From: Nic

 =
 > >   Krhinos: Thanks Rukus... (Helooks at the monitor) Dracon, the 
  twe=
nty
  > >   cycles are up! Engage the engines when you're ready!

  >=
 >   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  > >   >=
 --Rukus--
  > >   > 
  > >   > Rukus grabbed the comm, "Good to go on your=
 signal Krhinos. 
  The
  > bird 
  > >   > shall fly." He preped the last =
of the timewarp engines, and 
  engaged 
  > >   > the power drives. The pa=
nel lit up with an all green, and the
  > engine 
  > >   > began to glow a=
nd hum.
